text:
Hi,

I am trying to add a resync button so that it goes to an external link and fetches the data.

     `<Button`
        `onClick={handleResync}`
        `variant="primary"`
        `size="md"`
        `type="button"`
        `disabled={!QuoteId} // Disable button if QuoteId is not set`
      `>`
        `Resync`
      `</Button>`


  `const handleResync = async () => {`
    `try {`
      `if (QuoteId) {`
        `const response = await fetch(`<https://0286-2401-4900-8838-38ce-e86f-d2d2-ff50-6775.ngrok-free.app/resync/${QuoteId}>`, {`
          `method: 'POST',`
        `});`

        `const result = await response.json();`

        `if (result.success) {`
          `sendAlert({ type: 'success', message: 'Resync request sent successfully!' });`
          `// Optionally, refetch properties to update the UI or handle updates here`
          `fetchProperties([`
            `"dealname", "initial_sync", "sync_time", "last_synced", "simpro_url__c","contact_link","company_link","site_link","simpro_quote_id"`  
          `])`
          `.then(properties => {`
            `setDealName(properties.dealname);`
            `setSyncTime(properties.sync_time);`
            `setQuoteUrl(properties.simpro_url__c);`
            `setContactUrl(properties.contact_link);`
            `setCompanyUrl(properties.company_link);`
            `setSiteUrl(properties.site_link);`
            `setQuoteId(properties.simpro_quote_id);`
            `setQuoteSync(properties.simpro_url__c ? "Synced" : "Not Synced");`
            `setContactSync(properties.contact_link ? "Synced" : "Not Synced");`
            `setCompanySync(properties.company_link ? "Synced" : "Not Synced");`
            `setSiteSync(properties.site_link ? "Synced" : "Not Synced");`
          `})`
          `.catch(error => sendAlert({ type: 'danger', message: 'Failed to refresh properties' }));`
        `} else {`
          `sendAlert({ type: 'warning', message: 'Resync failed. Please try again.' });`
        `}`
      `} else {`
        `sendAlert({ type: 'warning', message: 'No Quote ID available for resync.' });`
      `}`
    `} catch (error) {`
      `sendAlert({ type: 'danger', message: 'Failed to send resync request' });`
    `}`
  `};`



When I try to click on the button, it is giving me following error
